SEARCH
Package ulb.infof307.g04.controllers

Class AbstractController

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g04.controllers.AbstractController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IController
Direct Known Subclasses:
EditDeckController, LearningController, LoginController, ProfileController, SettingsController, SignupController, StatisticsController, StoreController
public abstract class AbstractController extends Object implements IController
Abstract class for the different controllers of the application.

Every controller inherits from this class that provides basic controller functionalities.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller. This is used as an alternative way to make initialization procedures to the constructor, to ensure the FXML has been already properly loaded.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface IController

    • runAsync

      protected <T> void runAsync(Supplier<T> task, Consumer<T> onSuccess)
      Providing a way to perform a customer task asynchronously based on a supplier task
      Parameters:
      task - - the task providing results
      consumer - - the task consuming results

    • runAsync

      protected <T> void runAsync(Supplier<T> task, Consumer<T> onSuccess, String progressMessage)
      Providing a way to perform a customer task asynchronously based on a supplier task, with a progress msg to be displayed during the supplier task.
      Parameters:
      task - - the task providing results
      progressMessage - - the string msg to be displayed
      consumer - - the task consuming results

    • runAsync

      protected <T> void runAsync(Supplier<T> task, Consumer<T> onSuccess, String progressMessage, String errorMessage)
      Providing a way to perform a customer task asynchronously based on a supplier task, with a progress msg to be displayed during the supplier task and an error msg if it fails.
      Parameters:
      task - - the task providing results
      progressMessage - - the string msg to show progress
      errorMessage - - the string msg to show error
      consumer - - the task consuming results

    • runAsync

      protected void runAsync(Runnable task, Runnable onSuccess, String progressMessage, String errorMessage)
      Providing a way to perform a task asynchronously based on another task, both without a return, with a progress msg to be displayed during the supplier task and an error msg if it fails.
      Parameters:
      task - - the task to be ran first
      progressMessage - - the string msg to show progress
      errorMessage - - the string msg to show error
      consumer - - the task to be ran second

    • showAlertForException

      protected void showAlertForException(Exception e, String title)
      Method to show an error alert for the given exception with the specified title.
      Parameters:
      e - the exception to display in the alert.
      title - the title of the alert.

    • showAlertForException

      protected void showAlertForException(String title, String header, String content)
      Method to show an error alert with the specified title, header and content.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the alert.
      header - the header of the alert.
      content - the content of the alert.
